entry.title: Violent Crime, Rising Costs Put South Africa's Mining Industry in a Deep Hole
entry.content: Some longtime enterprises in the country’s storied $24 billion sector have headed for the exits, threatening an already struggling economy.

entry.title: Taliban Intensify Efforts to Take Control of Overseas Embassies
entry.content: Afghanistan’s new rulers are stepping up a campaign for control of the country’s diplomatic outposts, most of which continue to be run by appointees of the former, U.S.-backed government.
